name: Camera Obscura
description: An ancient tower in a forgotten land. A lone photographer on a desperate search. Facing dangerous animals, crumbling architecture, and perilous pitfalls, can you reach the summit of the Tower, and perhaps, redemption?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 550 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows Media Player is suggested for music
